comments.body: This is a very good idea
Slabs would be fantastic- since there's no way to do dirt or grass road slabs, packed mud would be an excellent way to make jump-free dirt paths for villages.
I really want the slabs so i can make nicer dirt roads
Honestly, copper has so much potential.
It should make iron rails.
Copper is very common so I like the idea of add crafting recipes for copper.
Я за таку ідею
Я за таку ідею
This would be especially good to really customize the speed of your minecarts
it will also give the item Mending Ⅰ and Unbreaking Ⅲ gives off totem particles and plays a sound "Totem activates" that is a edited version of that of an Undying totem
I think this would be good but I feel like it should be the same recipe as hoe except mirrored

I actually really like this idea! i'd maybe make it 2 resources (and of course, a netherite ingot in a smithing table with a diamond version to make the netherite version, as with all netherite variants) and a stick, but this would be really useful for farms. I'd additionally make it usable by dispensers in a similar manner to buckets, allowing for fully automatic farms.
Thanks for the thoughts!
Sorry, but a whole new tool for this particular reason would be quite useless. Instead, it could be an enchantment for hoes.

I could see that, but this wouldn't take away from the use of hoes since they are still needed to make farmland.  Plus, in real life, you don't chop down your wheat with a hoe, they usualy use hedge cutters or sickles.  Plus its another reason why you should level up villagers and not just keep them in a 1x4 area for trading only.
I think if you made it so one sickle goes in your off hand and one in your hotbar it would be cool

The tool is needed but the way you described it is not enough, we need Reach I-III as enchantment for the Sickle which will allow it to harvest 3x3, 5x5 and 7x7, also Sickle will harvest grass and seeds from it using the range of the Reach enchantment, Sickle could also been enchanted on Fortune III (to harvest more crops) or to Silk Touch (to harvest vines or other)
and a mud variant

YES
(It's all I can say really it's genius)
I like this idea maybe, it could maybe be like a weather detector and if any natural disasters are added  then maybe with some redstone you could detect them, but over all it a GREAT idea.
I like this idea maybe, it could maybe be like a weather detector and if any natural disasters are added  then maybe with some redstone you could detect them, but over all it a GREAT idea.

Even though I completly agree, I think the terrarium part might be a little much for the devs for ths single feature (even though it would be awesome!). 

But minecraft really needs more glass containers other than bottles, and it would be so fun to be able to put them down like blocks!

Personally, I think this would be a great addition to the wild update especially the firefly jar! It would be amazing to have something like a transparent chest. Also it could be used as a transparent bucket- so you could have jars of fish?

I really like this, it would add a lot of decoration.

Boats with storage are in 1.19. For shulkers there's already a request open here, so this is duplicate now of https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360077929611-Shulker-box-boats

These should be makeable with netherite and echo (that is to say, echo shards).

I also think lock picks are a good idea, but only offer a 90% chance to pick the lock.
I thought the colors and shapes for keys
To prevent players from cheating locks, the locked things should be unmineable, or at least extremely hard.

I feel like the lock and key should be a specific block but you can use a key. But you have to use an anvil to make a specific name on said key and the lock block, so key's with the same name as the block can unlock the block. and when that happens you can attach it to red stone if you wanted for dramatic entrances or just to better hide your stuff.
That would actually be cool to change the color of the lamp. I think they should add this
Great idea! It's weird they still haven't added this yet but i hope it gets added o.o

It would make for a great Bonsai tree substitute, a little trunk and a poofy canopy. I would also like to see a way to prevent berries from growing on the regular bush. The new Azalea bush is great and all but we need a scrub like bush for deserts and it simply doesnt work with the berries.

407131827251

Fair point, they do grow from ceilings. I'm just offering suggestions.

This would be amazing especially if you could still harvest them
Maybe the ballista could have its own arrows, because it seems a little too overpowered for Mojang that it uses normal ones.
Mmm i think there should be dedicated ballista bolts instead of just regular little arrows. Ballista bolts could be stored locally in the ballista in stacks of up to 32, since they’re so big.
So that they are not too strong, they cannot be simply obtained. Components will drop out like boats in older versions.

The bastions are in too poor condition for such equipment. In addition, Nether's relief does not favor such a long-range weapon. And for ghasts, crossbows are enough. Ballista needs some other structure.
Use silk touch to get a path block, place the fence on the ground, break the block under the fence, then place the path block, now you have a fence on a path block
Well, that would qualify as a "bug," so while it's a neat temporary solution, I think we should get this to be a full-on feature.

I love this idea! Minecraft needs more small features like this, it is the small things that make a game better!

Good idea, but melting touch sound too much like silk touch. I suggest blazing or just melting.
Maybe some restrictions are needed. For example, it cannot be used to dig diamonds, otherwise the diamonds will be burnt due to the high temperature.
